info.name: mv-spion freigeschaltet ohne Werbung
info.description: Wer auf mv-spion.de (und anderen) einen Adblocker aktiviert hat, kommt nicht in den Posteingang. Dieser Style sorgt daf√ºr, dass der Posteingang wieder funktioniert.

style.css:
/* AGENT_SHEET */

@-moz-document url-prefix("http://www.mv-spion"),
url-prefix("http://www.bayern-spion"),
url-prefix("http://www.brandenburg-spion"),
url-prefix("http://www.bremen-spion"),
url-prefix("http://www.bw-spion"),
url-prefix("http://www.hamburg-spion"),
url-prefix("http://www.hauptstadt-spion"),
url-prefix("http://www.hessen-spion"),
url-prefix("http://www.niedersachsen-spion"),
url-prefix("http://www.nrw-spion"),
url-prefix("http://www.rlp-spion"),
url-prefix("http://www.saarland-spion"),
url-prefix("http://www.sachsen-anhalt-spion"),
url-prefix("http://www.sachsen-spion"),
url-prefix("http://www.sh-spion"),
url-prefix("http://www.thueringen-spion"),
url-prefix("http://www.austria-spion"),
url-prefix("http://www.kanton-spion")

 {
    #advert_bigsize_box {display:block !important;width:100px   !important;height:100px !important;}
    #spion_bigsize {display:block !important;width:100px   !important;height:100px !important;}
    #spion_skyscraper {display:block !important;width:100px   !important;height:100px !important;}
}
